item.title: Full Startup Page Layout
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" video_bg="yes" video_bg_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lEWtXiUY5Q0" video_bg_parallax="content-moving" css=".vc_custom_1491394844401{background-color: #3a3a3a !important;}"][vc_column 0=""][vc_single_image image="3708" img_size="full" alignment="center" onclick="custom_link" img_link_target="_blank"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row 0=""][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Visual Composer Parallax Effect" font_container="tag:h1|font_size:50|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1490368099732{padding-top: 15px !important;}"]

Visual Composer Parallax effect background allows creating simple and beautiful parallax effects for your WordPress website in seconds. Simply choose an image you want to use in your background and select parallax style.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Purchase Now" style="custom" custom_background="#6baa9d" custom_text="#ffffff" size="lg" align="center" link="|||" css=".vc_custom_1493378286570{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1490366132939{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}"][vc_column 0=""][vc_separator 0=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1453210963159{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-all_inclusive" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" css_animation="appear" custom_background_color="#6baa9d"][vc_custom_heading text="Parallax Styles" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_column_text 0=""]

Select from different parallax effect styles that come pre-packed with your Visual Composer package.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-favorite_border" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" css_animation="appear" custom_background_color="#6baa9d"][vc_custom_heading text="One Click Option" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_column_text 0=""]

It takes one click only to add a parallax effect to your WordPress website. No more codes and tons of settings - with Visual Composer it is hassle free.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-hourglass_empty" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" css_animation="appear" custom_background_color="#6baa9d"][vc_custom_heading text="Parallax Speed" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_column_text 0=""]

Control parallax effect speed with simple input control to adapt the speed to fit your content and layout perfectly.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-star_border" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" css_animation="appear" custom_background_color="#6baa9d"][vc_custom_heading text="Modern Websites" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:22|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_column_text 0=""]

99% of all modern websites now have parallax effect, make sure you don't fall behind. It is really easy to create a trendy website with Visual Composer.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1490366945096{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #6baa9d !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_custom_heading text="All-in-One Parallax Effect" font_container="tag:h3|font_size:40|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal" css=".vc_custom_1490367707209{margin-top: -20px !important;}"][vc_column_text 0=""]

Visual Composer lets you combine several images to create an advanced parallax effect. Experience the easiest parallax for WordPress ever made.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_btn title="Purchase Now" style="outline" color="white" size="lg" align="center" link="|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row 0=""][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="How to Add Parallax Effect?" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:40|text_align:center" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1453210963159{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-settings" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" css_animation="appear" custom_background_color="#6baa9d"][vc_column_text 0=""]

Navigate to the row settings where you would like to apply parallax effect and choose 'Edit'.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-desktop_mac" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" css_animation="appear" custom_background_color="#6baa9d"][vc_column_text 0=""]

Select parallax style you want to use from the drop-down menu in the row settings window.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_icon type="material" icon_material="vc-material vc-material-perm_media" color="white" background_style="rounded" background_color="custom" size="lg" align="center" css_animation="appear" custom_background_color="#6baa9d"][vc_column_text 0=""]

Select image from your Media Library that you want to use in your parallax effect and 'Save' changes.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row 0=""][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_btn title="Try Visual Composer for Free" style="custom" custom_background="#6baa9d" custom_text="#ffffff" size="lg" align="center" link="|||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
